description: I am a strong mom and woman who is honest , sincere , faithful , loyal , loving , caring, compassionate , kind , and affectionate . I love to make others laugh and take others feelings into consideration . I also like to be silly and I value God, my daughter is my 1st priority! I value family and my best friend whom is my sister incarnate! I'm looking for my soulmate and I know he's out there somewhere ? I'm a huge fan of cuddling and having fun in life . I'm am laid back and easy to talk to and am very understanding . I've been on 1 other dating site and have found that it is full of fake profiles and liars ! I don't play games . What you see is what you get with me !
